clinic_details: HealthCare Plus Clinic is located at 123 Health St. Parking available behind the building. Hours: Mon-Fri 9:00-17:00, Sat 9:00-12:00.
insurance_billing: We accept Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, and Medicare. Payment by cash, credit/debit, and most HSA cards.
visit_preparation: Bring a government ID, insurance card, and a list of current medications. For first visits bring previous medical records if available.
policies: Cancellation policy: Please cancel 24 hours prior to avoid fees. Late arrival policy: Arrive 10 minutes before your scheduled time. COVID-19 protocols: Masks recommended.
